metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11504 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The islist function in markdown.c in libmarkdown.a in DISCOUNT 2.2.3a allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read) via a crafted file, as demonstrated by mkd2html.

criterions.comment: discount package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.4-1').
